response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your specific needs. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience significantly. Given its value to you, we're offering it at a special price of $12,000. This is a unique opportunity to acquire a high-quality product at a price that reflects its true worth while offering you a substantial savings compared to its market value. I believe this offer will be mutually beneficial, providing you with exceptional value while allowing us to fairly compensate for our investment and expertise. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.", "product_price": 12000}
